price: Say, “My Lord, forgive and have mercy, and you are the Best of those who show mercy.”
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ وَٱرۡحَمۡ وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi igh'fir wa-ir'ḥam wa-anta khayru al-rāḥimīna
